> I'm not sure if KK allows upgrading yet (it might, I know they were talking about it), but even if it doesn't, it would be very easy to include alternate cfg's which could be swapped out for various era's of development at the cape, specially if the pads were split up to have the towers as seperate models. (a single LC39 style pad, with multiple MLP setups, Saturn V, Saturn 1B with the "milkstool", Shuttle, and the new grey [SLS tower](http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/A6.jpg)) I think it would be cool to have a cfg for the [proposed LC39 C/D pads](http://heroicrelics.org/info/lc-39/lc-39-abcd.html) too. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 

ok, I know this is an old quote, but thought I might mention it...I think the SLS Tower is just an old Saturn V tower that has been repainted and refurbished...
